title: Accidentally disenchanted spirit guard udyr
body: So i get the skin from a chest, play a few games to buy udyr, disenchant some shards for the essence, then in my hype i accidentally disenchanted the shard instead of activating it. Is there literally anything that can be done, or do i live with regret for life?

replies.body:
Unfortunately there is nothing we can do :(

Any time you go to disenchant or upgrade a piece of content, you are given an additional confirmation button or a confirmation box making sure this is the action you wish to take.

I wish I could be the bearer of better news!

what about a lock feature? 

lots of other games have that to prevent things like this happening, it could really help prevent this too
I see this happens regularly though -- you guys might want to explore a slight UI change to make it more apparent what you're about to do.

Orrrr, don't be dumb and read.
Yeah well, we're talking about human people here, I think you've set your expectations a bit too high :P
The fact that there is ALWAYS a confirmation means that you never read it, though... Maybe consider a confirmation only for Legendary+ and Legacy Skins?
Same here, it's really common because they put disenchant as the first option. I wish Riot knew how to make UI's...looking at you set-order mastery and rune pages. {{item:3070}}

Thats rough dude, perhaps riot could start up a charity for players who accidentally disenchanted their SGU shards

you have my condolences. I wish that it were envy instead
Unfortunately there's no ability to reverse Hextech Crafting actions once they go through. I'm sorry to be the bearer of bad news :(
